meta.description: GKrellM, a themeable process stack of system monitors.
meta.name: gkrellm

meta.description: Themeable process stack of system monitors

license.fullName: GNU General Public License v3.0 or later

meta.long_description:
GKrellM is a single process stack of system monitors which
supports applying themes to match its appearance to your window
manager, Gtk, or any other theme.
meta.name: gkrellm
